title: Uncaged Love #1
description:
From the author of the bestselling contemporary romance series Revenge
Colt McClure is a rising MMA fighter out to prove that he has what it takes to be a champion.Jo is on the run from her one terrible mistake.When Colt drags Jo from a brawl with street thugs, he recognizes her potential as a female fighter.But as they begin her training, their desire for each other sparks a love affair that could jeopardize them both.UNCAGED LOVE VOLUME 1 is 25,000 words or about 110 pages.UNCAGED LOVE is a 5-part series. Each book is approximately the same length.
author: J.J.  Knight
